title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync
description: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync (1GILQD5)
OB: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the exported jar file for the second time.
EB: The out of sync message should not be displayed when the exported jar file is overwritten.
SR:
1. Open the project directory.
2. Export the directory as a jar file.
3. Save the exported jar file in the same directory.
4. Overwrite the exported jar file.
5. Verify that the out of sync message is displayed.
